objects.name: Outpost
objects.description: Strategic points on the map that teams must capture or defend.
objects.special_rules: Once captured by ATK, cannot be retaken by DEF.

objects.name: Tank
objects.description: Player-controlled vehicle used to attack or defend outposts.

systems.name: Capture Base
systems.description: A strategic game mode where ATK aims to capture all outposts while DEF defends them.
systems.mechanics: Teams compete to capture/defend 3 outposts within a 4-minute match.
systems.objectives: ATK wins by capturing all outposts or achieving 20 kills; DEF wins by retaining at least 1 outpost or achieving 20 kills.

systems.name: Gold & Upgrade System
systems.description: A resource-based system allowing players to upgrade stats using gold earned during matches.
systems.mechanics: Players earn gold through kills, captures, and passive generation; spend gold on upgrades.
systems.objectives: Enhance tank stats (HP, Damage, Fire Rate, Movement Speed) to gain advantages.

logic_rules.description: When ATK captures an outpost, it cannot be retaken by DEF.
logic_rules.trigger: ATK team successfully captures an outpost.
logic_rules.effect: Outpost changes control to ATK permanently; grants +300g per person.

logic_rules.description: DEF earns passive gold for holding outposts.
logic_rules.trigger: DEF retains control of an outpost over time.
logic_rules.effect: Generates +14g/s per player while holding outposts.

logic_rules.description: Players earn bonus gold for achieving kill streaks.
logic_rules.effect: +50g bonus; ends streak grants +100g to the player ending it.

requirements.title: Victory Conditions Implementation
requirements.description: Define win/lose conditions for ATK and DEF teams.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: ATK wins by capturing all outposts or 20 kills; DEF wins by retaining 1 outpost or 20 kills.

requirements.title: Gold Balance Design
requirements.description: Ensure balanced gold flow for ATK and DEF teams.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: ATK gains gold spikes through captures; DEF maintains steady income via passive generation.

requirements.title: UI/UX Design for Match Feedback
requirements.description: Implement UI elements to display match progress and resources.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Include outpost icons, capture progress, gold counter, skill slot, and upgrade shop visuals.
